long_description: Don't get left out in the cold. The SOL survival blanket reflects up to 90% of your body's heat back to you and is sized to shelter 1 - 2 adults. Bright orange exterior is easy to spot, even in bad weather. Survival and first-aid instructions are printed directly on the blanket for convenience. Measures 96 in. x 60 in. and is sized to shelter 1 - 2 adults. Blanket provides protection from water and wind. SOL survival blanket is easy to open and fold in cold weather; folded flat, it's easy to pack.
short_description: Don't get left out in the cold. The SOL survival blanket reflects up to 90% of your body's heat back to you and is sized to shelter 1 - 2 adults.
